basic.color: Flower color white, fruit color orange

maintenance.size: Diameter ≥ 20 cm, height can reach 10-20 m
maintenance.soil: Likes loose and breathable sandy loam
maintenance.sunlight: Like sunshine, high quality fruits in sunny places
maintenance.watering: Likes wet environments, water thoroughly when soil is dry
maintenance.pruning: Remove weak, overlapping, over-crowd, and diseased or insect-infested branches timely
